name: Basic Geometry - Plane (2D)
description: Learn & Exercise (solve the quiz) on Plane (2D) Geometry This app offer a game that will assist the player to learn about plane/2D geometry and test his/her knowledge by exercising against auto generated quiz provided on each topic. Topics covered in this app including: 1. Square 2. Rectangle 3. Triangle 4. Parallelogram 5. Trapezoid 6. Rhombus  7. Kite 8. Circle Topics are arranged on level basis, the player can learn and move on to the new level after passing test on current level. After completing all levels, exam mode will be unlocked and player can test his/her knowledge on all topics.
